product.longDescription:
Take Proxis luggage on your next trip to travel with both confidence and style. The Roxkin™ outer shell provides remarkable strength and resilience in a multi-layered lightweight design that you can find only at Samsonite. The ergonomic handle, dual spinner wheels, TSA-friendly lock, and built-in USB port add convenience to your experience, providing you with everything that you need when you’re on the move.
• Elongated double tube pull handle
• Smooth rolling double wheels
• Unimaginably strong - An innovative material produced at Samsonite’s own production plant. Roxkin™ bounces back into shape and is resilient to shocks.
• The interior offers immense packing capacity with thoughtful features for organized packing.
• The two divider pads, large pocket and removable, in-height adjustable cross ribbons ensure you can pack and compress your belonging carefully.
• Weight: 4.72 lbs.

Body Dimensions: 19.0" x 13.1" x 8.7"
Overall Dimensions: 23.6" x 16.3" x 9.3"
product.shortDescription: Take Proxis luggage on your next trip to travel with both confidence and style. The Roxkin™ outer shell provides remarkable strength and resilience in a multi-layered lightweight design that you can find only at Samsonite. The ergonomic handle, dual spinner wheels, TSA-friendly lock, and built-in USB port add convenience to your experience, providing you with everything that you need when you’re on the move.

tooltip: The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions

An exclusive multi-layered material developed by Samsonite that bounces back into shape, offering remarkable strength, resilience and lightness. The sophisticated, self-reinforced design resonates confidence and is built to last while fully equipped
Built in USB port lets you power devices on the go. Battery sold separately
To learn more about TSA locks and how to set the lock please visit our lock instructions page
Does the case expand for added packing capacity?
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Proxis Carry-On Spinner | Carry-On Luggage | Samsonite
product.pageDescription: Unlock a new era of traveling with the Proxis Carry-On Spinner. Its sophisticated design, with its Roxkin™ outer shell material, inspires confidence.
product.pageKeywords: samsonite carry on silver, samsonite proxis carry on
